item.title: New Container: Pwndrop
item.description: We have released a new container for Pwndrop! Pwndrop is a self-deployable file hosting service for sending out red teaming payloads or securely sharing your private files over HTTP and WebDAV.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Pwndrop!

Pwndrop is a self-deployable file hosting service for sending out red teaming payloads or securely sharing your private files over HTTP and WebDAV.
